transaction_id.description: must be a string and is required

transaction_name.description: must be a string and is required

account_id.description: must be a string and is required

account_name.description: must be a string and is required

amount.description: must be an integer and is required

type.description: must be an array or a string and is required

tx_date.description: must be a date and is required. Date of the transaction

timestamp.description: must be a date and is required. Date on which the transaction is added to the database.

refunded.description: must be bool or null and is required.

refunded_double_checked.description: must be a bool and is required.

payment.description: must be a bool and is required. Whether the transaction is a payment or not (if false, then it is an income).
